I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.

participant_2.background:
Instead of eating cake, I went for a walk in the woods at midnight.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i have not seen her since.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
I'm not normally confrontational, but I would fight to protect my loved ones.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

content.text: Hi there! I have been feeling a bit down lately because my parents just moved to Florida. I love them a lot and I am going to miss them a lot.
Oh I am sorry to hear that. I know what you mean. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since.
Wow, that is tough. I have never had to experience anything like that. I would really miss my mom if she was not around.
It was very difficult at first. But I have learned to cope with it and I have my dad and my parakeet to keep me company.
I am glad that you have people to help you through this. I think I would be lost without my parents.
Yes, it is important to have a support system. I am also not normally confrontational, but I would fight to protect my loved ones.
I can relate to that. I am not normally confrontational either, but if someone were to threaten my family, then I would do whatever it takes to protect them.
It is good to know that you would protect your family. I feel the same way about my dad and my parakeet.
I am sure that your dad and your parakeet appreciate that.
I am glad that we could talk about this. It has helped me feel a bit better.
I am glad that I could help
